tool_description:
TVShow - Movies and Series (Netflix/AmazonPrime/HBO/Star+/Disney and many others)
API to search movie and series, details, cast, watch providers and more.
name: TVShow
title: TVShow

api_list.name: /Movie/{itemId}/Media
/Serie/{itemId}/Media
/Video/{itemId}/Serie/{season}/episode/{episode}
/Video/{itemId}/Serie/{season}
/Video/{itemId}/Serie
/Video/{itemId}/Movie
/Genre/Movie
/Serie/OnTheAir
api_list.description: Get a list of TV shows that air in the next 7 days.

api_list.name: /Serie/Search
/Movie/Discover
/Movie/Popular
api_list.description: Get a list of movies ordered by popularity.

api_list.name: /Movie/TopRated
api_list.description: Get a list of TV shows ordered by rating.

api_list.name: /Movie/Detail
/Language
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tvshow.p.rapidapi.com/Language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tvshow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tvshow.p.rapidapi.com/Language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tvshow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
